013package org.apache.juneau.bean.openapi.ui;
014
015import static java.util.Collections.*;
016import static org.apache.juneau.bean.html5.HtmlBuilder.*;
017import static org.apache.juneau.bean.html5.HtmlBuilder.a;
018import static org.apache.juneau.common.utils.Utils.*;
019
020import java.util.*;
021
022import org.apache.juneau.*;
023import org.apache.juneau.bean.html5.*;
024import org.apache.juneau.bean.openapi3.*;
025import org.apache.juneau.collections.*;
026import org.apache.juneau.common.utils.*;
027import org.apache.juneau.cp.*;
028import org.apache.juneau.swap.*;
029
030/**
031 * Generates an OpenAPI-UI interface from an OpenAPI document.
032 *
033 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
034 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="https://juneau.apache.org/docs/topics/JuneauBeanOpenApi3">juneau-bean-openapi-v3</a>
035 * </ul>
036 */
037public class OpenApiUI extends ObjectSwap<OpenApi,Div> {
038
039   static final FileFinder RESOURCES = FileFinder
040      .create(BeanStore.INSTANCE)
041      .cp(OpenApiUI.class, null, true)
042      .dir(",")
043      .caching(Boolean.getBoolean("RestContext.disableClasspathResourceCaching.b") ? -1 : 1_000_000)
044      .build();
045
046   private static final Set<String> STANDARD_METHODS = set("get", "put", "post", "delete", "options", "head", "patch", "trace");
047
048   /**
049    * This UI applies to HTML requests only.
050    */
051   @Override
052   public org.apache.juneau.MediaType[] forMediaTypes() {
053      return new org.apache.juneau.MediaType[] {org.apache.juneau.MediaType.HTML};
054   }
055
056   private static class Session {
057      final int resolveRefsMaxDepth;
058      final OpenApi openApi;
059
060      Session(OpenApi openApi) {
061         this.openApi = openApi.copy();
062         this.resolveRefsMaxDepth = 1;
063      }
064   }
065
066   @Override
067   public Div swap(BeanSession beanSession, OpenApi openApi) throws Exception {
068
069      var s = new Session(openApi);
070
071      var css = RESOURCES.getString("files/htdocs/styles/OpenApiUI.css", null).orElse(null);
072      if (css == null)
073         css = RESOURCES.getString("OpenApiUI.css", null).orElse(null);
074
075      var outer = div(
076         style(css),
077         script("text/javascript", RESOURCES.getString("OpenApiUI.js", null).orElse(null)),
078         header(s)
079      )._class("openapi-ui");
080
081      // Operations without tags are rendered first.
082      outer.child(div()._class("tag-block tag-block-open").children(tagBlockContents(s, null)));
083
084      if (s.openApi.getTags() != null) {
085         s.openApi.getTags().forEach(x -> {
086            var tagBlock = div()._class("tag-block tag-block-open").children(
087               tagBlockSummary(x),
088               tagBlockContents(s, x)
089            );
090            outer.child(tagBlock);
091         });
092      }
093
094      if (s.openApi.getComponents() != null && s.openApi.getComponents().getSchemas() != null) {
095         var modelBlock = div()._class("tag-block").children(
096            modelsBlockSummary(),
097            modelsBlockContents(s)
098         );
099         outer.child(modelBlock);
100      }
101
102      return outer;
103   }
104
105   // Creates the informational summary before the ops.
106   private Table header(Session s) {
107      var table = table()._class("header");
108
109      var info = s.openApi.getInfo();
110      if (info != null) {
111
112         if (info.getDescription() != null)
113            table.child(tr(th("Description:"),td(toBRL(info.getDescription()))));
114
115         if (info.getVersion() != null)
116            table.child(tr(th("Version:"),td(info.getVersion())));
117
118         var c = info.getContact();
119         if (c != null) {
120            var t2 = table();
121
122            if (c.getName() != null)
123               t2.child(tr(th("Name:"),td(c.getName())));
124            if (c.getUrl() != null)
125               t2.child(tr(th("URL:"),td(a(c.getUrl(), c.getUrl()))));
126            if (c.getEmail() != null)
127               t2.child(tr(th("Email:"),td(a("mailto:"+ c.getEmail(), c.getEmail()))));
128
129            table.child(tr(th("Contact:"),td(t2)));
130         }
131
132         var l = info.getLicense();
133         if (l != null) {
134            var content = l.getName() != null ? l.getName() : l.getUrl();
135            var child = l.getUrl() != null ? a(l.getUrl(), content) : l.getName();
136            table.child(tr(th("License:"),td(child)));
137         }
138
139         ExternalDocumentation ed = s.openApi.getExternalDocs();
140         if (ed != null) {
141            var content = ed.getDescription() != null ? ed.getDescription() : ed.getUrl();
142            var child = ed.getUrl() != null ? a(ed.getUrl(), content) : ed.getDescription();
143            table.child(tr(th("Docs:"),td(child)));
144         }
145
146         if (info.getTermsOfService() != null) {
147            var tos = info.getTermsOfService();
148            var child = StringUtils.isUri(tos) ? a(tos, tos) : tos;
149            table.child(tr(th("Terms of Service:"),td(child)));
150         }
151      }
152
153      return table;
154   }
155
156   // Creates the "pet  Everything about your Pets  ext-link" header.
157   private HtmlElement tagBlockSummary(Tag t) {
158      var ed = t.getExternalDocs();
159
160      var content = ed != null && ed.getDescription() != null ? ed.getDescription() : (ed != null ? ed.getUrl() : null);
161      return div()._class("tag-block-summary").children(
162         span(t.getName())._class("name"),
163         span(toBRL(t.getDescription()))._class("description"),
164         ed != null && ed.getUrl() != null ? span(a(ed.getUrl(), content))._class("extdocs") : null
165      ).onclick("toggleTagBlock(this)");
166   }
167
168   // Creates the contents under the "pet  Everything about your Pets  ext-link" header.
169   private Div tagBlockContents(Session s, Tag t) {
170      var tagBlockContents = div()._class("tag-block-contents");
171
172      if (s.openApi.getPaths() != null) {
173         s.openApi.getPaths().forEach((path, pathItem) -> {
174            // Check each HTTP method in the path item
175            if (pathItem.getGet() != null)
176               addOperationIfTagMatches(tagBlockContents, s, path, "get", pathItem.getGet(), t);
177            if (pathItem.getPut() != null)
178               addOperationIfTagMatches(tagBlockContents, s, path, "put", pathItem.getPut(), t);
179            if (pathItem.getPost() != null)
180               addOperationIfTagMatches(tagBlockContents, s, path, "post", pathItem.getPost(), t);
181            if (pathItem.getDelete() != null)
182               addOperationIfTagMatches(tagBlockContents, s, path, "delete", pathItem.getDelete(), t);
183            if (pathItem.getOptions() != null)
184               addOperationIfTagMatches(tagBlockContents, s, path, "options", pathItem.getOptions(), t);
185            if (pathItem.getHead() != null)
186               addOperationIfTagMatches(tagBlockContents, s, path, "head", pathItem.getHead(), t);
187            if (pathItem.getPatch() != null)
188               addOperationIfTagMatches(tagBlockContents, s, path, "patch", pathItem.getPatch(), t);
189            if (pathItem.getTrace() != null)
190               addOperationIfTagMatches(tagBlockContents, s, path, "trace", pathItem.getTrace(), t);
191         });
192      }
193
194      return tagBlockContents;
195   }
196
197   private void addOperationIfTagMatches(Div tagBlockContents, Session s, String path, String method, Operation op, Tag t) {
198      if ((t == null && (op.getTags() == null || op.getTags().isEmpty())) ||
199         (t != null && op.getTags() != null && op.getTags().contains(t.getName()))) {
200         tagBlockContents.child(opBlock(s, path, method, op));
201      }
202   }
203
204   private Div opBlock(Session s, String path, String opName, Operation op) {
205
206      var opClass = op.getDeprecated() != null && op.getDeprecated() ? "deprecated" : opName.toLowerCase();
207      if (!(op.getDeprecated() != null && op.getDeprecated()) && !STANDARD_METHODS.contains(opClass))
208         opClass = "other";
209
210      return div()._class("op-block op-block-closed " + opClass).children(
211         opBlockSummary(path, opName, op),
212         div(tableContainer(s, op))._class("op-block-contents")
213      );
214   }
215
216   private HtmlElement opBlockSummary(String path, String opName, Operation op) {
217      return div()._class("op-block-summary").children(
218         span(opName.toUpperCase())._class("method-button"),
219         span(path)._class("path"),
220         op.getSummary() != null ? span(op.getSummary())._class("summary") : null
221      ).onclick("toggleOpBlock(this)");
222   }
223
224   private Div tableContainer(Session s, Operation op) {
225      var tableContainer = div()._class("table-container");
226
227      if (op.getDescription() != null)
228         tableContainer.child(div(toBRL(op.getDescription()))._class("op-block-description"));
229
230      if (op.getParameters() != null) {
231         tableContainer.child(div(h4("Parameters")._class("title"))._class("op-block-section-header"));
232
233         var parameters = table(tr(th("Name")._class("parameter-key"), th("Description")._class("parameter-key")))._class("parameters");
234
235         op.getParameters().forEach(x -> {
236            var piName = x.getName();
237            var required = x.getRequired() != null && x.getRequired();
238
239            var parameterKey = td(
240               div(piName)._class("name" + (required ? " required" : "")),
241               required ? div("required")._class("requiredlabel") : null,
242               x.getSchema() != null ? div(x.getSchema().getType())._class("type") : null,
243               div('(' + x.getIn() + ')')._class("in")
244            )._class("parameter-key");
245
246            var parameterValue = td(
247               div(toBRL(x.getDescription()))._class("description"),
248               examples(s, x)
249            )._class("parameter-value");
250
251            parameters.child(tr(parameterKey, parameterValue));
252         });
253
254         tableContainer.child(parameters);
255      }
256
257      if (op.getResponses() != null) {
258         tableContainer.child(div(h4("Responses")._class("title"))._class("op-block-section-header"));
259
260         var responses = table(tr(th("Code")._class("response-key"), th("Description")._class("response-key")))._class("responses");
261         tableContainer.child(responses);
262
263         op.getResponses().forEach((k,v) -> {
264            var code = td(k)._class("response-key");
265
266            var codeValue = td(
267               div(toBRL(v.getDescription()))._class("description"),
268               examples(s, v),
269               headers(v)
270            )._class("response-value");
271
272            responses.child(tr(code, codeValue));
273         });
274      }
275
276      return tableContainer;
277   }
278
279   private Div headers(Response ri) {
280      if (ri.getHeaders() == null)
281         return null;
282
283      var sectionTable = table(tr(th("Name"),th("Description"),th("Schema")))._class("section-table");
284
285      var headers = div(
286         div("Headers:")._class("section-name"),
287         sectionTable
288      )._class("headers");
289
290      ri.getHeaders().forEach((k,v) ->
291         sectionTable.child(
292            tr(
293               td(k)._class("name"),
294               td(toBRL(v.getDescription()))._class("description"),
295               td(v.asMap().keepAll("type","format","items","collectionFormat","default","maximum","exclusiveMaximum","minimum","exclusiveMinimum","maxLength","minLength","pattern","maxItems","minItems","uniqueItems","enum","multipleOf"))
296            )
297         )
298      );
299
300      return headers;
301   }
302
303   private Div examples(Session s, Parameter pi) {
304      var m = new JsonMap();
305
306      try {
307         var si = pi.getSchema();
308         if (si != null)
309            m.put("model", si.copy().resolveRefs(s.openApi, new ArrayDeque<>(), s.resolveRefsMaxDepth));
310      } catch (Exception e) {
311         e.printStackTrace();
312      }
313
314      if (m.isEmpty())
315         return null;
316
317      return examplesDiv(m);
318   }
319
320   private Div examples(Session s, Response ri) {
321      var m = new JsonMap();
322      try {
323         var content = ri.getContent();
324         if (content != null) {
325            // For OpenAPI 3.0, content is a map of media types to MediaType objects
326            content.forEach((mediaType, mediaTypeObj) -> {
327               if (mediaTypeObj.getSchema() != null) {
328                  try {
329                     var schema = mediaTypeObj.getSchema().copy().resolveRefs(s.openApi, new ArrayDeque<>(), s.resolveRefsMaxDepth);
330                     m.put(mediaType, schema);
331                  } catch (Exception e) {
332                     e.printStackTrace();
333                  }
334               }
335            });
336         }
337      } catch (Exception e) {
338         e.printStackTrace();
339      }
340
341      if (m.isEmpty())
342         return null;
343
344      return examplesDiv(m);
345   }
346
347   private Div examplesDiv(JsonMap m) {
348      if (m.isEmpty())
349         return null;
350
351      Select select = null;
352      if (m.size() > 1) {
353         select = select().onchange("selectExample(this)")._class("example-select");
354      }
355
356      var div = div(select)._class("examples");
357
358      if (select != null)
359         select.child(option("model","model"));
360      div.child(div(m.remove("model"))._class("model active").attr("data-name", "model"));
361
362      var select2 = select;
363      m.forEach((k,v) -> {
364         if (select2 != null)
365            select2.child(option(k, k));
366         div.child(div(v.toString().replace("\\n", "\n"))._class("example").attr("data-name", k));
367      });
368
369      return div;
370   }
371
372   // Creates the "Model" header.
373   private HtmlElement modelsBlockSummary() {
374      return div()._class("tag-block-summary").children(span("Models")._class("name")).onclick("toggleTagBlock(this)");
375   }
376
377   // Creates the contents under the "Model" header.
378   private Div modelsBlockContents(Session s) {
379      var modelBlockContents = div()._class("tag-block-contents");
380      if (s.openApi.getComponents() != null && s.openApi.getComponents().getSchemas() != null) {
381         s.openApi.getComponents().getSchemas().forEach((k,v) -> modelBlockContents.child(modelBlock(k,v)));
382      }
383      return modelBlockContents;
384   }
385
386   private Div modelBlock(String modelName, SchemaInfo model) {
387      return div()._class("op-block op-block-closed model").children(
388         modelBlockSummary(modelName, model),
389         div(model)._class("op-block-contents")
390      );
391   }
392
393   private HtmlElement modelBlockSummary(String modelName, SchemaInfo model) {
394      return div()._class("op-block-summary").children(
395         span(modelName)._class("method-button"),
396         model.getDescription() != null ? span(toBRL(model.getDescription()))._class("summary") : null
397      ).onclick("toggleOpBlock(this)");
398   }
399
400   /**
401    * Replaces newlines with <br> elements.
402    */
403   private static List<Object> toBRL(String s) {
404      if (s == null)
405         return null;  // NOSONAR - Intentionally returning null.
406      if (s.indexOf(',') == -1)
407         return singletonList(s);
408      var l = Utils.list();
409      var sa = s.split("\n");
410      for (var i = 0; i < sa.length; i++) {
411         if (i > 0)
412            l.add(br());
413         l.add(sa[i]);
414      }
415      return l;
416   }
417}
